bibl.title: From Temple to Cell, from Gods to Demons: Pagan Temples in the Monastic Topography of Fourth-Century Egypt.
From Temple to Church. Destruction and Renewal of Local Cultic Topography in Late Antiquity

bibl.seg: BRAKKE David, From Temple to Cell, from Gods to Demons: Pagan Temples in the Monastic Topography of Fourth-Century Egypt.

Johannes HAHN, Stephen EMMEL and Ulrich GOTTER (Edd.), From Temple to Church. Destruction and Renewal of Local Cultic Topography in Late Antiquity = Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 163 (Leiden - Boston, 2008) pp. 91-112.
